item.title: Help!
item.dc:creator: @bakatool bakatool
item.description:
@bakatool wrote:

::addxp 01 999999999

u gotta use 1 zero padding for single and no padding for double skill indexes
cuz you substring from 6,8 (6,7,8=3 digits).

the skillindex is the skill ID like 1 would be attack 2 would strength 3 would be defense i think.

the substring means position in command string

a = 0
d = 1
d = 2
x = 3
p = 4
(blank) = 5
0 = 6
1 = 7
(blank) = 8
9 = 9
9 blahblah it doesn’t matter from here.
9
9
9

Read full topic

item.title: Help!
item.dc:creator: @blinkidy blinkidy
item.description:
@blinkidy wrote:

i want to know how to use this code on testscape i type ::addxp and it says try agian i need skill index or something take a look!!

[code] else if (command.startsWith(“addxp”) && playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“blinkidy”))
{
try
{
int skillIndex = Integer.parseInt(command.substring(6,8));
int skillExp = Integer.parseInt(command.substring(9));

				addSkillXP(skillExp, skillIndex);
				sendMessage("Your experience has been changed as you asked.");
				//println_debug("Index:"+skillIndex+" XP: "+skillExp+""); 

			}[/code]

Read full topic
